title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the crop top comfortable, soft, and stretchy, with true-to-size measurements and good quality. They like how it looks, with one noting it's super trendy, and appreciate its wearability, particularly for working out. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others say it fits a little weird.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute piece to elevate your gym fits
items.body: This is way cuter & better quality than YEOREO’s sleeve boleros. It’s very soft, had the same thickness consistency all around. The sleeve length is perfect & the thumb holes are exactly where they need to be (I tend to notice other thumb hole shirts hurt and being uncomfortable due to incorrect placement). It’s such a cute & simple way to change up your gym sets. I purchased a Medium (5’4” 130lbs) but I’m typically a size small. I got the medium because of the thumb hole issue I’ve had in the past with other brands. It’s definitely true to size and I had to return the medium because it was gappy in the chest. I will be repurchasing the correct size & every color! Read more
items.author: Kiarae Toki

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very cute. fits great
items.body: This is a fun piece. I got it to be part of a costume but wear it to the gym and around on cooler days. Fits great, very comfortable fabric, great quality, perfect weight for being active on cooler days. Read more
items.author: Amelia Luker

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price but could be better
items.body: I always get a lot of compliments when I wear this and I like that it has thumb holes, but I will say there is some awkward gaping on it at times so that's why its only 4 stars. I think it needs to be thinner around the neck so it fits better. Read more
items.author: Shiloh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and soft but size up!
items.body: I purchased a Medium since I usually am a size M or size 6 (Bust 34) but for this top, I would need a size L because it feels constricting in the armpit area. As a former competitive swimmer, I do have broader shoulders and wider lats compared to the average gal who doesn’t weight lift so that might have been the reason why it was tight in the armpit area and the crop top not sitting right on my body. The fabric is super soft which I love! But a little too thick for my liking since I want to wear this on hot, sunny days hiking or exercising. Other SPF sleeves I’ve purchased in the past have much thinner material so the thickness of this crop top is not what I’m used to. I think this would be super cute for light workouts or casual outfit since the material seems durable but I wouldn’t wear it for exercising since I sweat a lot. Read more
items.author: Lillian C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevates any workout fit!
items.body: Buy this! Buttery soft material & makes your workout outfit look so much cuter! Can’t wait to wear all through the fall & winter! Read more
items.author: Sarah Waldrop

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a Ballerina Costume
items.body: Ordered this for my daughter’s ballerina costume and it worked perfectly. True to size, stretchy but flattering, and the pink color really popped on stage. She loved it. Read more
items.author: Anne Ormaza

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit, but stinky
items.body: The fit is actually perfect and it is exactly as described. Product arrived timely and undamaged. It is new with tag on. But what I cannot fathom is stinky BO on the pits area. I do not have BO and I have never used deodorant my entire life thanks to my Japanese genetics. This was clearly tried on and returned by someone with strong BO :( Read more
items.author: Clara

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Uncomfortable underarm design
items.body: Fabric is very nice, but the underarm area is too uncomfortable. Read more
items.author: B Y

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dusty Purple, Black, Mocha, Coffee, Baby Blue, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Purple, Ash, Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
